name: Singular Defense - GMTK Jam 2019
description:
Singular Defense is a tower defense game with a catch.  You can only have one defensive weapon operating at a time.  Pick and choose which weapon to place at which spot and which to upgrade first to best defend your towers.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam, 2019.  The theme of the jam was "Only One," thus only having one weapon available at a time.

I greatly underestimated how time consuming it would be to create levels for a tower defense game (add a new enemy at the end of the wave, test the whole thing.  repeat over and over).  Therefore, this game only has 3 levels.  If there is enough demand for it, I may spend some time working on new levels.
